title: I AM NELSON What Happened Next: The story of the little dog continues. Still dead. Still as alive as ever.
description: A book for dog (and cat) lovers and anyone who’s ever loved and lost an animal.Funny and very moving, this is the sequel to the heartwarming memoir I AM NELSON: The story of a little dog who’s larger than life. Even when he’s dead.More hilarious anecdotes about Nelson's unconventional family and friends and all the furry siblings (dogs, yes and cats!) he never knew when he was still alive.More moving true stories of animals being rescued and adopted by his parents.More strange and spooky goings-on.A lot more laughs… and the occasional tear…
author: Martina Mars
